titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an John Maynard Keynes, [23. 10. 1913]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Original an der King's College Library in Cambridge; Kopie im BA. Publiziert (deutsch: Briefe, S. 36; Cambridge Letters, S. 44).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: Dear Keynes, My address is: L. W. c/o Halvard Draegni Skiolden, Sogn, Norway. I did not go as far north as I thought I would. This is a splendid place.
